Articles.Content:
What would you like to see in the next dev diary? My top three in no particular order are

- colonies

- the VAB

- the maneuver node tool
Yeah colonies and overall mechanics are high on my list. It may be though that they aren’t developed tightly enough to share? Here’s hoping!

I doubt we'll get a dev diary about colonies game mechanics this early in development.

VAB and maneuver node tool changes would be cool.
personally I hope we get to see more spacecraft parts and what new types of part we are going to get
Building a spacetation today. Would love to see more of the orbital colonies.
